play_bottle.description: Sure, little boys love to play with cars and trucks, but they have their nurturing side too. Here, Felix bottle-feeds his favorite toy plane.
play_bottle.title: Play Bottle

play_stacking.description: Up, up, up! Felix is getting more and more intersted in stacking.  He once managed to stack a plane on top of a cement truck, and gave himself a standing ovation.
play_stacking.title: Play Stacking

play_train1.description: Felix loves his choo-choos. This weekend he got some new train cars and a tunnel.
play_train1.title: Play Train 1

playground_bouncer.description: Family trip to the playground.  We ventured to a new one this time, in Portrero Hill. New equipment to try out!
playground_bouncer.title: Playground Bouncer

playground_slide1.description: Watch out Felix, someone's coming behind you!
playground_slide1.title: Playground Slide 1

playground_swing.description: Swinging can be a very relaxing experience.
playground_swing.title: Playground Swing

sokol_all.description: The Sokols came to visit the west coast, all the way from Houston Texas!  Left to right: Cousin Meg, gracious host Felix, 1½ month old Thomas, and Ron.
sokol_all.title: Sokol All

sokol_felix1.description: Felix and Thomas curl up for a photo-op.
sokol_felix1.title: Sokol Felix 1

sokol_felix2.description: Felix wasn't quite sure what to make of Thomas. He moved extremely carefully around him.
sokol_felix2.title: Sokol Felix 2

sokol_tom.description: Thomas is looking very alert for a baby this young. Hey, you've got to make the most of a California vacation!
sokol_tom.title: Sokol Tom

z_goodnight_moon.description: We read Goodnight Moon to Felix every night, in the rocking chair, after his bottle. Many nights we don't get to the last page before he's fallen asleep.
z_goodnight_moon.title: Z Goodnight Moon

description:
Felix is talking more and more, though we are still the only ones to understand him. His pronouciation is approximative at best. Felix mixes French, English and baby signs. For some things he has all 3 versions. Water is "water", "de l'eau" or palms rubbing. More is "more", "(en)'core" or fingers tapping palm.

All dogs are now "Georgie", the dog at Sylvie's.

He calls Lucie's shoes "chaussures" and Dean's shoes "shoes".

All muppet-like animals are "melmo", meaning Elmo.

Felix's favorite TV show is Blue's Clues, which he asks for by name: "boos coos".

First 3 syllable word: "abricot" (apricot, in French)
title: August 10
